caption.p:
Comparison of simulated permafrost distribution in the baseline period (1981–2010) with the existing frozen soil maps: ( a) Simulated results in the baseline period (1981–2010), ( b) frozen soil map from Shi et al.
46 (The data set was obtained from Environmental and Ecological Science Data Center for West China, National Natural Science Foundation of China, http://westdc.westgis.ac.cn), and ( c) map of permafrost on the QTP from Li and Cheng
47 (The data set was obtained from Cold and Arid Regions Sciences Data Center at Lanzhou, http://westdc.westgis.ac.cn). (The figure was created using ArcGIS 10.1 http://www.esri.com/ software).
